repos_data.description: :house: Home Assistant configuration & Documentation for my Smart House.  Write-ups, videos, part lists, and links throughout. Be sure to :star: it. Updated FREQUENTLY!
The official AWS SDK for Java 1.x (In Maintenance Mode, End-of-Life on 12/31/2025). The AWS SDK for Java 2.x is available here: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-java-v2/
A curated list of tools and resources for Amazon sellers.
